Package com.datastax.stargate.sdk

Class StargateClient

java.lang.Object
com.datastax.stargate.sdk.StargateClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable
public class StargateClient extends Object implements Closeable
Global Client to interact with a Stargate instance.
Author:
Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)
